frames.caption: A capybara relaxes on a pizza-shaped float in a swimming pool, wearing red sunglasses. It holds a refreshing drink in one paw and a smartphone in the other, enjoying a leisurely day.
frames.description: The scene depicts a whimsical and relaxing setting where a capybara is lounging on a pizza-shaped float in a swimming pool. The animal is accessorized with sunglasses and is holding a drink and a smartphone, suggesting a carefree and leisurely atmosphere.

frames.caption: A capybara lounges on a pizza-shaped float in a swimming pool, sipping a drink with a slice of lime and holding a smartphone. The animal is wearing sunglasses, enjoying a sunny day in a relaxed manner.
frames.description: The scene is set in a swimming pool where a capybara is leisurely floating on an inflatable shaped like a slice of pepperoni pizza. The atmosphere is laid-back and summery, with the capybara appearing to enjoy a drink and some entertainment on a smartphone.

summary: Animals: capybara. Objects: pizza float, sunglasses, drink, smartphone, swimming pool. Actions: relaxing, floating, lounging, sipping, holding. Emotions: leisure, contentment, relaxed. Scenes: summer, poolside, swimming pool. Concepts: relaxation, whimsy, leisure, vacation
